TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {194206=Although he has not thrown an MLB pitch in 2015, Brandon League threw 7,055 pitches that were tracked by the PITCHf/x system between 2007 and 2014, including pitches thrown in the MLB Regular Season, the MLB Postseason and Spring Training. In 2014, he relied primarily on his Sinker (94mph), also mixing in a Splitter (86mph) and Slider (87mph). He also rarely threw a Fourseam Fastball (94mph)., 51461=Last Update: 12/31/2014 23:59 ET}

Signed extension with LA Dodgers 10/30/12. $3M signing bonus ($1M paid in 2012, $2M in 2015). 13:$4.5M, 14:$7.5M, 15:$7.5M. 16: player option. 2016 option guaranteed at 1) $7.5M with 55 games finished in 2015, 2) $8.5M with 55 GF in 2015 and 100 GF in 2014-15, or 3) $9M with 55 GF in 2015 and 150 GF in 2013-15.
